channel.title: GIF Images
channel.description:
I think more people should get into making Quality GIF Images. (mine oviously aren't)
A really easy way to make GIF images frame by frame is using [url=http://www.whitsoftdev.com/unfreez/]UnFREEz[/url] . You simply drag and Drop images and set the Frame Interval.
I decided to make a couple.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=358762.0;attach=16029[/img] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=358762.0;attach=16031[/img]
And now the best of the best: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=358762.0;attach=16033[/img]
